comments: She clearly she went to Touro for her graduate/doctorate degree- she does not know her subject matter at all. I think I could have explained the material better. She is a harsh grader and does not give any feedback as to why she took off the points. Touro needs to really look into who they hired- she sucks.

This teacher does not know much about her subject matter. She teaches experimental psychology with a PsyD, little background in research methods. She can be nasty and obnoxious when it comes to communication with her students. She does not explain criteria for grading. You will leave this class confused. Do not take her if you can avoid it!
Nice teacher will repeat if needed. Class is never boring. Tests can be hard but if you prepare well you should ace her class.
I took professor rooz for intro to psych. The classes are boring but shes very nice and tests are easy

I took Professor Rooz for abnormal psych. She is a great professor. She brings in a lot of examples from her work, her class has a relaxed atmosphere to it. She is hard though. You need to know the material. Her first test was killer. But if you work hard, you can definitely get the grade.
Awesome professor...looked forward to her classEs every week!! A must to take

She is a great proffessor very clear. Her tests are easy buy you need to know all the material learned in class. They are thorough although she is not out to trick you in any way. She is not good about answering emails etc. but she says straight out that she\'s not good. I took her for intro to psych and she was great. I loved her class
she is very nice as a person, her tests arent that great--and she isnt too leniant on marking---she never answers her emails--so good luck contacting her if u have a problem

She is very sweet and nice. Once the class warms up and discussion begins it turns into an extremly enjoyable and interesting. Tests are multiple choice and there is a paper and presentation. Although it is not a free a with just a slight amount of effort and work an a is extremely possible. highy reccomended.

She is an amazing professor! very sweet and understanding.She has a lot of patience.Her tests are very straight forward.Take notes.I highly recommend taking her class!!I really enjoyed intro to psychology.
Amazing proffesor!!! Definitely take her....tests are very straight and she\'ll help out! I took her for theories of personality...eaSy A!

She\'s an amazing professor and an amazing person! I took this Professor for Developmental Psychology and could not have been happier I did. She is very understanding and will work with you on test dates etc. Tests are directly from the notes; if you study, you\'ll know it. Crystal clear lectures. I got an A+ and really enjoyed her classes!
She\'s amazing! Take her. Class is 98% discussion!
